name: Grafixoft
description:
Grafixoft is an innovative and IT Mark certified company that provides tailored software services, business solutions and IT consulting.

Grafixoft was established in Bulgaria in 1998. Over the years, it has built up long-lasting partnerships with companies from Norway, Belgium, UK, and USA by creating reliable software applications and, thereby, helping to increase their market share. Our success comes as natural result of the win-win relationships with our customers and employees.
